note: Line up with the far right or left side of doorframe in the room below, to be able to not fall back through after entry, as the door remains open.

nodes.name: Missile (Wrecked Ship middle)
Wrecked Ship Main Shaft Central Junction

obstacles.name: Right Bomb Blocks
obstacles.note: The bomb blocks that separate the bottom right door from the main shaft

obstacles.name: Shot Blocks
obstacles.note: The shot blocks that separate the bottom door from the main shaft

obstacles.name: Left Bomb Blocks
obstacles.note: The bomb blocks that separate the main shaft from the item on the left

enemies.groupName: Wrecked Ship Main Shaft Trapped Atomics

strats.name: Coverns and Atomics Farm (Power Off)
note: To shoot the Atomics with Ice or Plasma, crouch near the edge of the glass and shoot forward;
angled shots downwards also work but from a tile further back.

strats.name: Blocks Already Broken
strats.note: Crouch Jump then Morph from the stairs or run and jump then Morph with no movement assists.

strats.name: Shoot the Blocks
strats.note: Crouch Jump then Morph from the stairs or run and jump then Morph with no movement assists.

strats.name: Power Bomb
note: Use a Power Bomb to bounce into the morph tunnel.
This will break the shot blocks and the Bomb Blocks going to the door to the right.

strats.name: Partial Covern Ice Clip
note: Use the Covern to partial ceiling clip so your beam can reach the shot block of the ceiling at the end of the Morph tunnel to the left.
It is possible to mid-air morph to get into the morph tunnel with nothing, from the Covern, the ground, or the stairs below.

strats.name: Temporary Blue Bounce (Phantoon Dead)
note: Run towards the conveyor to more easily build the ShineCharge, and for an easier bounce into the morph tunnel.
Neutral bounce into the Morph tunnel, and SpringBall bounce to continue all the way through.

strats.name: Chain Temporary Blue Bounce (Phantoon Alive)
strats.note: Neutral bounce into the Morph tunnel, and SpringBall bounce to continue all the way through.
strats.devNote: Defeating Phantoon makes this strat easier.

strats.name: G-mode Moprh Overload PLMs
strats.note: Use the camera scroll blocks just left of the bomb blocks, in order to overload PLMs and go through them.

strats.name: Base
strats.note: From this direction, the shot blocks are fully breakable with Power Beam

strats.name: Power Bombs
note: It is possible to use a single Power Bomb to break the bomb blocks going left to the item, right to the door, and shot blocks going down.
Place the power bomb against the right wall at the top of the stairs between the three obstacles.

strats.name: G-mode Overload PLMs
note: Use the camera scroll blocks just right of the bomb blocks, in order to overload PLMs and go through them.
Cancel g-mode, morph and move back towards the bomb blocks in order to fix the camera.

strats.name: G-mode Morph to Missiles While Blind
note: Use the camera scroll blocks just right of the bomb blocks, in order to overload PLMs and go through them.
Exit g-mode and travel to the item and back while off screen.

strats.name: G-mode Morph
strats.note: Use the camera scroll blocks just left of the bomb blocks, in order to overload PLMs and go through them.

strats.name: Basement Speedball (Phantoon Dead)
note: This speedball is easier with Phantoon dead, since you can push the robots all the way left.
It's even possible to setup the short hop mockball by bonking the center platform.

strats.name: Basement Speedball (Phantoon Alive)
strats.note: This speedball is harder with Phantoon alive and has a shorter runway because of the robot standing in the way.

strats.name: G-mode Morph
strats.note: Use the camera scroll blocks just left of the bomb blocks, in order to overload PLMs and go through them.

strats.name: Speedball
strats.devNote: A more controlled angle is needed entering the room for this strat.

strats.name: G-mode
strats.note: Use the camera scroll blocks just right of the bomb blocks, in order to overload PLMs and go through them. Cancel g-mode and return into the morph tunnel to fix the camera.

strats.name: G-mode Morph While Blind
strats.note: Use the camera scroll blocks just right of the bomb blocks, in order to overload PLMs and go through them. Dodge the enemies while getting to the door.

nodes.name: Bowling Statue

reusableRoomwideNotable.name: Bowling Alley Ceiling Bomb Jump
reusableRoomwideNotable.note: This is a very long ceiling bomb jump.

strats.name: 2-hit Bowling
strats.note: This is doable even without any momentum from a previous room, but pretty tight.

strats.name: 2-hit Speed Bowling
strats.note: A bit easier than 2-hit bowling

strats.name: Shinespark
devNote: Should we have this one if you're not assumed to know the layout? You can't go out of the room to set it up once you see what room it is.
But then again, it'd be a softlock either way if you have no way through.

strats.name: XMode
strats.note: Move in XMode until the Chozo Statue becomes visible and then jump before releasing XRay.

strats.name: Bowling Alley Ceiling Bomb Jump
strats.note: This is a very long ceiling bomb jump.

strats.name: Bowling Alley G-mode Morph Ceiling Bomb Jump
strats.note: This is a very long ceiling bomb jump. Leave g-mode before using the Chozo Statue.

devNote: It's one-way because there's no logical reason to go to the statue and back out to the door.
The spikes only do damage if Phantoon is defeated, but there's no reason to cross to 6 unless he has.

strats.name: X-Ray Climb
note: Climb up 1 screen.
Climb quickly once you reach the spikes to minimize damage (if Phantoon is dead).
I-frames will run out while using X-Ray, so you don't want to hold X-Ray for long.

strats.name: Bomb the blocks
strats.note: If using PBs, place it far enough right to reach the shot blocks.

strats.name: Long Beam and Screw
strats.note: Plasma or Charged Spazer can reach the shot blocks through the tunnel while crouched.
devNote: Plasma is somewhat known as a way to reach the blocks.
Charge+Spazer is not, and to shoot around the Bowling Chozo you would add Wave to make things more complicated.
If we're requiring strat knowledge here, camera unlock is more generally applicable.
A very precise wave shot from the stairs can also work but is much harder and less obvious than the camera unlock strat.

strats.name: Bowling Alley Missile Chozo Camera Unlock
note: Break the shot blocks with Power Beam by first rolling into the morph tunnel to unlock camera scroll for this room.
The blocks can now be cleared from the left side by shooting and quickly scrolling the camera to the right a small amount.
A shot from crouch will reach the bottom block by following the shot as a ball, or wave beam works from the stairs.
Screw Attack is still needed to clear the bomb blocks.

strats.name: Base
strats.note: The bomb block respawns. It must be broken on the way back too.

strats.name: Temporary Blue Bounce and SpringBall
note: Use Temporary Blue to bounce into the Morph Tunnel with temp blue then continue to the bomb block using SpringBall.
Just left of center of the pit is a good place to bounce for entering the tunnel.
Requires either a tight shortcharge or clearing the power bomb blocks to open up more runway.
strats.devNote: Killing phantoon only removes requirements for the strat.

strats.name: Crystal Flash Grapple Clip
strats.note: Menu to Grappling Beam before the crystal flash ends and mash shoot while holding down.

locks.name: Wrecked Ship Right Super Spawn Lock

unlockStrats.name: Base
unlockStrats.note: The item doesn't spawn until Phantoon is defeated.

enemies.groupName: Wrecked Ship East Supers Trapped Atomics

strats.name: Base
strats.note: By normal means, the path can't be passed unless the Workrobot is activated (so Phantoon dead)

strats.name: Blue Speed Jump
note: Run on the conveyor to build Speed for breaking the bomb block.
Push the right side Worker Robot onto the conveyor
Jump low into the wall so Samus' head touches the block.
Speed can be used to clear the Bulls.
strats.devNote: Spacejumping from left conveyor feels a little harder.

strats.name: WS East Supers Robot Clip (Left to Right)
note: Kago through the Workrobot by jumping, pressing down, then morphing and moving right just before hitting the robot.
The bomb blocks can be broken with a bomb, Power Bomb, or using Screw Attack.
If using bombs, be careful when breaking the bottom bomb block - if morphed, you will be pushed into it and stuck.
To do this, place a bomb at the bottom, then a bomb at the peak boost height and unmorph before landing. Alternatively use a short jump morph.
If the morph tunnel is open, kagoing through the robot will force Samus into it.
devNote: If Phantoon is alive, 'Base' can be used instead.
Note that this strat is useless in vanilla, as the item only spawns if Phantoon has been killed.

strats.name: WS East Supers Robot Clip Run-In-Place
note: Kago into the worker robot and start running away from the wall until the bomb blocks are broken with SpeedBooster.
The short charge taps are extremely precise because gaining too much run speed and Samus will exit the robot.
devNote: If Phantoon is alive, 'Blue Speed Jump' can be used instead.
Note that this strat is useless in vanilla, as the item only spawns if Phantoon has been killed.

strats.name: Base
strats.note: By normal means, the path can't be passed unless the Workrobot is activated (so Phantoon dead)
strats.devNote: This doesn't require breaking the bomb blocks on the premise that you can't get here without breaking them.

strats.name: WS East Supers Crystal Flash Clip (Right to Left)
note: Crystal flash to force a standup then spin jump up then morph to bypass the dead robot. Use Coverns to damage down if necessary.
Note that if the Covern spawns on Samus while crystal flashing, it will deal large amounts of damage.
To avoid this, it is recommended to kill the Covern and leave its drop, then quickly get in the morph tunnel and CF.
devNote: If Phantoon is alive, 'Base' can be used instead.
Note that this strat is useless in vanilla, as the item only spawns if Phantoon has been killed.

strats.name: Sponge Bath Bull Boost
strats.note: Position the Bull with beam shots before jumping into it.

strats.name: Exterior Speedjump
strats.note: A bit finicky for shorter runways, but exactly 3 tiles works.

strats.name: Sponge Bath In-Room Speedjump
strats.note: It doesn't work from flush against the door. Start moving about half a tile away from it.

strats.name: Ceiling Bomb Jump
strats.devNote: It is possible with a low vertical diagonal bomb jump, or a double HBJ, but those aren't tech yet.

strats.name: G-mode Morph Ceiling Bomb Jump
strats.note: Kill the Bull with bombs, by switching between the high and low ground. Rapidly place bombs while rolling slowly.
strats.devNote: It is possible with a low vertical diagonal bomb jump, or a double HBJ, but those aren't tech yet.

strats.name: Suitless Water Shinecharge
strats.note: Start at least 2 tiles from the water line, and stutter just before entering the water in order to charge a spark in room.

nodes.name: Energy Tank, Wrecked Ship

locks.name: Wrecked Ship Energy Tank Spawn Lock

unlockStrats.name: Base
unlockStrats.note: The item doesn't spawn until Phantoon is defeated.

obstacles.name: Remain in G-Mode Morph to Ceiling Bomb Jump

enemies.note: Drops can be reached for free using the platforms

strats.name: Walljump
note: Jump across the first platforms. It is fine to jump from them when they are a bit submerged.
Get a bit of run speed on the final platform, and wall jump if necessary.
When accidentally falling off the platforms, it may be best to take a spike hit and climb the left wall.

strats.name: Wrecked Ship E-Tank Platforming
note: Jump onto the first platform, which is easiest when the water is low.
Continue jumping on the platforms to prevent them from going into the water.
Get a bit of run speed on the final platform, which is easiest while the water is low, then jump to the solid ground.

strats.name: Wrecked Ship E-Tank Spring Ball Bounce
note: From a standstill at the door, jump just before the first step.
Do a lateral mid-air morph and bounce on the first platform.
This should bounce on the third platform and get to the item.

strats.name: Precise Grapple
strats.note: Fling Samus from the first set of grapple blocks to the second set without falling. Requires precise timing.

strats.name: Phantoon is Alive Walljump
strats.note: From the top right platform, jump to the left into the thorns, then climb the left wall.
strats.devNote: The canCarefulJump and Gravity are here, as with either of those, there is access across with or without f_DefeatedPhantoon.

strats.name: Phantoon is Alive Speed Walljump
note: Run from the adjacent room and jump at the end of the platform.
From the top right platform, jump to the left and wall jump just above the spikes and climb the left wall.
strats.devNote: Because this requires canCarefulJump, there is no canRiskPermanentLossOfAccess as there is a path across with or without f_DefeatedPhantoon.

strats.name: Precise Grapple
strats.note: Fling Samus from the first set of grapple blocks to the second set without falling. Requires precise timing.

strats.name: G-mode Morph Ceiling Bomb Jump
strats.note: Touch the item while remaining in artificial morph. Ceiling bomb jump back to the right, then use x-ray to cancel g-mode and obtain the item.
